name: Solquence (itch)
description:
Solquence is a puzzle game combining strategy and classic card game elements! Place your next card on the board to make pairs, straights, or flushes to clear the level. Gain special cards, some helpful (the sun card), some less helpful (the death card), as you make your way to higher levels. Come up with your own strategy for placing cards, setting up matches, and managing the next deck you're dealt. If you fill up the 7 by 7 board entirely, it's game over.

Solquence features:

- An easy to follow tutorial that gets you in the game right away

- Up to 500 levels of increasing difficulty

- A high score tracker to show off your personal bests

- And an undo button for when things get tricky!

* Solquence - designed for mobile, now for Windows! Tap/click to control the game. To increase or decrease the window size, use the up or down arrows on your keyboard, or page up/page down. 

** Note that Solquence for Windows will auto-generate two data files to save your progress and will store them right next to Solquence.exe - solquence.dat and solquenceRecord.dat - if these files are lost, the game will reset to default.
